HomePage.title: InterZone Technologies LLC
HomePage.subtitle: Empowering Communities Through Technology
HomePage.welcome: Welcome! We build innovative mobile and web applications designed to connect, inspire, and support our local communities.
HomePage.flagship: Our flagship product, the InterZone app, is available for iOS and Android.
HomePage.expertiseList: Software Engineering, Mobile & Web Development, Cloud Infrastructure

AboutPage.title: About InterZone Technologies
AboutPage.description: InterZone Technologies LLC was founded to empower communities through innovative technology. We specialize in building modern, scalable web and mobile apps, and our flagship InterZone app connects people locally and globally.
AboutPage.closing: We believe technology can bring people together. Let’s build the future of community—together!
